documents.document: @FPSpencer @evolution1079 People who leave their cars awfully parked, especially in crowded lots. Have some consideration, people!
How do I stop Twitter from showing me promoted tweets for all of these horror movies? I don't want this. I never asked for this. Please.
@SarahEllen_4 Not sure how I missed this tweet. Love you 💛 Hope your week is going well so far!
Grammar - it's really not that hard.
There's nothing like tripping over shit on your floor & nearly severing your little toe from the rest of your foot to start off the morning.
... Which is, incidentally, the name of the radio documentary about sleep paralysis that @crthompson0809 and I made.
After every @DineOutVanFest meal, me: "I can't move."
⬇️ The nugget fund is in need of funds. https://t.co/c40NaQXA1W
@SarahEllen_4 Take a lot of naps, drink a lot of tea, and wear all the sweatpants you want. You're so close, you can do it! 💪
@CStefiuk15 Just giving you the answer you were looking for 🙃
In fact, yes, I have noticed this... because it's usually me. https://t.co/CN5v75QQs2

Me: "I'm broke."
Also me: makes a @DineOutVanFest reservation with no remorse
Which is fine. I don't need sleep anyway. 🙃

Living across from a pub
Pros: Pub food
Cons: Drunk people beating their chests and yelling "MOOORE" outside my window at all times of day
I had the opportunity to sleep for a full nine hours and I blew it. This is why I can't have nice things.
Can you believe I stayed up until 3am reading episode recaps for a Korean melodrama while bawling my eyes out
The adventures of Dearka Elsman('s arm). #GundamSEED https://t.co/sbodGKpz7p
It is not a mug cake if I have to mix the ingredients in two separate bowls before pouring them both into the mug. 😠
Soooo where's the snow at?
@SouthlandsJared breach of contract? 😂
Every time I look at my Snapchat story, I die a little inside but I force myself to leave it up - I cannot fail my 2017 resolution on day 1.
"Holiday Overeating" should be my middle name, considering how I stuffed my face tonight and as a result have become incapable of moving.
@missngquips thank you, friend
@klinothedino My Natalie Tung is fine, but I'm worried about my Natalie Lungs... the cold air isn't good for me 😷
I ate too much curry last night and now I can't move. Send help.
NOOOOOO NOT CARRIE FISHER NO
Today could've so easily been a bad day... and then I had @NandosPeriPeri for dinner. #thankgodfornandos
Honestly really disturbed by the amount of fanny packs I've seen so far at Contact...
@klinothedino But... I don't want to win this game...
Randomly thought about my law final just now and retched. I don't need this at 1 in the morning!!! 😖
Of course the one day I get the chance to see the PM at work is the day I decide to face my fears and go to the dentist's.
Why. Do. I. Keep. Uploading. Work. Stuff. To. My. Personal. Social. Media.
Guy on the skytrain: "Why did she send you a poo emoji? Is she saying she's taking a shit or you are a piece of shit?"
"I'm going to go to school early so that I can study some more." Hahaha shut up Natalie
I want Nando's. Right now.
Leave that bullshit on your personal social media instead of using a public platform as if your opinions represent all of us.
You know you need to go back to sleep when you wake up, look at photos of giraffes and start crying because they're SO. FRIGGIN. CUTE.
If anyone was curious, they're sour gummy worms now. https://t.co/bEcXareTcd
I'm that person who says no to doing something because I'm trying to save money but then goes home and does online shopping.
Looking at my credit card bill like... https://t.co/bs0elgJ99Y
It's the middle of the day, why do you even have your high beams on!?
@samanthacarley9 @czerwinskier meanwhile I just reached level 14... 😲
@samanthacarley9 omg please yes
Considering taking transit to work today so that I can get Poke Balls at each skytrain station along the way✌️
Thinking about how I'll get to sleep in until 8:30 tomorrow morning makes me really happy.
Meta... Except they're granola bars now. I love my snack drawer. https://t.co/IRUBYpl8Z0
That awkward moment when you accidentally tweet a work tweet from your personal account... Oops.
We're at @Rogers at Tsawwassen Mills Mall giving out goodies! I think @thearashow is more interested in their great… https://t.co/7o9o4iNzYy
@thearashow Sounds like your brain is unconsciously getting ready for when the baby arrives!
I just threw up. https://t.co/NKp5kt3KVj
I'm going to throw up. https://t.co/lAQg55oUga
Finding cotton candy in your hair and having no more f--ks to give because you've accepted that it's just a part of your life now
Me as an adult: "Which filing cabinet should I buy?"
Glanced into my garbage bin and all I saw were empty chocolate wrappers. My life is a mess.
Why do I always sleep in when I need to wake up early and wake up early when I want to sleep in?????
My dear laptop, why are you refusing to charge? All I want to do is watch Netflix in bed. Is that too much to ask for!? 😫
I'm SO LATE to the game but Solange's new album = 👌👌👌👌
Friends who are late together stay together. #driftcompatible https://t.co/BLtSlUPtP3
@evolution1079 @FPSpencer Clowns, spiders, wasps, heights, ghosts. Oh, and @klinothedino because he's tall and scary.
Apparently I was so tired last night that I set my alarm for 8:30PM instead of 8:30AM 😂 https://t.co/ryOSNmbbIZ
@anne_mckenna Thanks for the follow! Hope you're enjoying classes so far 😊
@SouthlandsJared @KanikaChantelle I hate both, let's be real
@Dextacular Pottermore let me believe that I'm a Slytherin for five years, then asked me to retake the Sorting Hat test... I'm so upset.
After years of insisting I'm a Slytherin, I've just been resorted into Gryffindor. I feel like the last 10 years of my life have been a lie.
@gracewyc PHOSDAY WAS MY PUN FIRST, STOP HIJACKING IT
@klinothedino Hah! That pun made me laugh very freely. I definitely Felt that in my belly!
Puns give me so much joy. I wish more people would make puns.
@gracewyc Are you so desperate to go to sleep that you disrespect me with such an uninspired response? https://t.co/sQtfkpxEr5
@gracewyc Neither have I! Cultural osmosis is a magnificent beast.
@gracewyc Did you know that in the novel, "frankly" isn't actually part of that line?
@gracewyc MEAN GIRLS QUOTES WON'T GET YOU ANYWHERE
@gracewyc NATALIE COMING AT YOU WITH ALL THE RECEIPTS 📝
@gracewyc I like how it took you 24 hours to come up with a response... https://t.co/NIO7VQqQXp
Everyone, chill out. It's the last skytrain stop, we're all getting off here. There is absolute no need for pushing.
@gracewyc you're making a terrible decision
@gracewyc stop watching supernatural
Saw my dad reading on his laptop in the dark and said to him, "You're going to ruin your eyes." I think I'm turning into my mom.
Hey Apple, thanks for deleting nearly 40GB of local music files off of my computer. Thanks. I really appreciate it.
ALL I WANTED WAS FRESH AIR WHY ARE YOU SMOKING UNDER MY WINDOW MR NEIGHBOUR?????
@SouthlandsJared Half-asleep me forgot to add "compared to when you were 18" 😭
Staying up late bingeing on TV is a lot more exhausting the next morning when you're 23 😴
Just found out falafel is an add-on option at @freshii... https://t.co/zmytVdsT5r
@SouthlandsJared 4 weeks early is a little extreme 😭
Why. Am. I. Awake. I. Just. Want. To. Sleep. In.
I... don't have anything to do tomorrow? I can sleep in? 😭 <- those are tears of joy
Even while on opposite sides of the country... Is this what they call "great minds think alike"? https://t.co/CcJXz0Yw30
#WhyDoSomePeopleHashtagEntireSentences?

Me: I'm going to bed at a decent time! I'm so proud of myself!
Also me: Oh. It's 2AM.
Where were y'all when nearly 300 people were killed in Baghdad during Ramadan? Where were your "Pray for Baghdad"s or "Pray for Iraq"s then?
Very disappointed to see a group that I've been supporting since 2010 do something like this. #notcool https://t.co/eVNGgAtch6
This TV show has ghosts. Ok, I'm out.
Every time I start a new TV show: "Do I really want to do this? Am I really ready to commit to another show?"
I went into London Drugs to kill time today and accidentally came out $4 poorer with two bags of candy.
Oh my god YES. https://t.co/SQ6SKDdKGY
@klinothedino I see that you're putting to good use the skills you gained in online design
Why. Is. It. So. Hot. Today.
When you realise that the live stream you'd been trying to access for the past half hour is US only... 😑😑
That feel when your foot falls asleep midstep and you're left stranded in the middle of the sidewalk, slowly dying inside.
Wow. Woooow... #Brexit
